title: Ranked Rewards
body: So before the season ended I was silver 5 but before the ranked rewards were given, but my friend says that if you were silver and the season ends you still get the rewards. The rewards haven't appeared (If I was supposed to get any) but I know there is a bit of delay sometimes. Someone please tell me! Thanks :3   {{champion:6}}  to be kidding me!

replies.body:
Once the rewards are given out, we enter the "preseason". You are not eligible for any rewards during this period, no matter what division you get into.

Sorry about that, but the new season has started, hence meaning you're now eligible for the 2015 rewards. Best of luck!
I meant after the rewards were given XD
